personalInfo.name: M. Brillian
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer & Data Scientist
personalInfo.description: I combine web development skills with data science expertise to create innovative solutions.
summary: I'm a 22 years old computer science graduate, based in Karawang, Indonesia. I have more than 2 years of experience in full stack development and data science.

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experiences.description: Design and implement an academic system using MERN stack. Integrate frontend and backend using RestAPI. Configure a combination RBAC and ABAC to differentiate between user access levels. Migrate database from conventional spreadsheets into MongoDB.

experiences.title: IT Staff
experiences.description: Provided basic technical support to employees, including password resets and software installations. Contributed to the smooth operation of the company's IT infrastructure. Troubleshooted and resolved issues with Windows operating system, Microsoft Office, and various business applications.

experiences.title: Machine Learning
experiences.company: College Project – University of Singaperbangsa Karawang
experiences.description: Led and coordinated team to collect, clean, prepare dataset, and train machine learning models for house price prediction in Central Jakarta.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.company: College Project – University of Singaperbangsa Karawang
experiences.description: Designed and implemented a culinary inspiration website using PHP.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.company: Course Project – Bangkit Academy, led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, & Traveloka
experiences.description: Performed data analytics on Olist e-commerce dataset. Implemented descriptive analysis, data wrangling, EDA, data visualization, and dashboard development.

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experiences.company: College Project – University of Singaperbangsa Karawang
experiences.description: Designed and developed a web-based library management system for book lending, returns, and inventory tracking. Created a MySQL database to manage books, users, and penalties.

experiences.title: IT Technician (Teknisi TI)
experiences.description: Develop and manage IT solutions to support the competition. Maintain stable internet and provide comprehensive IT support for judges, including hardware/software configuration, platform monitoring, real-time technical assistance, score input guidance, and rapid troubleshooting to ensure seamless judging.

internships.title: Machine Learning Intern
internships.company: Bangkit Academy, led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, & Traveloka
internships.description: Responsible as a machine learning intern that built an image classification model. Collected and cleaned images dataset from duplicates, anomalies, and inconsistencies. Preprocess and built machine learning (ML) model using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) and Transfer Learning.

volunteering.description: Led and coordinated all staff to run the outbound of SEMESTA event.

volunteering.title: Equipment & Logistic Staff and Facilitator Assistant of MOZART Event
volunteering.description: Prepared all equipment required for the running of MOZART Event. Organized and set up event venue. Coordinate with facilitators to align outbound with event rundown.

organization.title: General Education and Training
organization.description: Responsible to monitor and evaluate student learning activities. Coordinate with educators and staffs to ensure learning strategies and program goals. Provide regular reports and updates to management.

certificates.title: The MERN Fullstack
certificates.description: Comprehensive course covering MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js stack for full-stack web development. Learned to build scalable web applications with modern JavaScript technologies.

certificates.title: Digital Entrepreneurship Academy
certificates.description: Professional development program focused on digital business strategies, e-commerce, and online marketing. Gained insights into digital transformation and business innovation.

certificates.title: Machine Learning Specialization
certificates.description: Comprehensive machine learning program covering supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning. Mastered algorithms, neural networks, and practical ML implementation.

certificates.title: TensorFlow Developer Specialization
certificates.description: Specialized training in TensorFlow framework for building and deploying machine learning models. Learned deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing techniques.

certificates.title: Google Data Analytics Specialization
certificates.description: Complete data analytics program covering data collection, cleaning, analysis, and visualization. Proficient in R, SQL, Tableau, and Google Analytics for business insights.

certificates.description: Specialized training in TensorFlow framework for building and deploying machine learning models. Learned deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing techniques.
